```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(pacman)
p_load(tidyverse, readxl, kableExtra)

```

```{r data, include=FALSE}
main <- read_excel("./data/TEMPO_SR_2019-07-09.xlsx", sheet = "Main") %>% 
  replace(is.na(.), "")
```

# Source, type, main data and methods 

```{r}
main %>% 
  select(FA_surname, Year_pub, 
         Source, Pub_type, 
         Type_1, Type_2, Type_3, Type_4, Method) %>% 
  kable(col.names = c("Author",
                      "Year of publication",
                      "Source",
                      "Type of publication",
                      "Main data type 1",
                      "Main data type 2",
                      "Main data type 3",
                      "Main data type 4",
                      "Method of estimating temporary population")) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```

# Other characteristics 

```{r}
main %>% 
  select(FA_surname, Year_pub,
         National, Country_1, Country_2, Region_type, Region,
         Day, Est_tunit, Est_tunit_num, 
         Purpose_1, Purpose_2, 
         Data_size_users, Est_pop_size, 
         Est_unit_type_1, Est_unit_type_2	, Est_spat_num_1, Est_spat_num_2, 
         Validation, Software_avail, Est_avail) %>% 
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```
